INSERT INTO lora_gw_eui_trash (eui, status, date)

name: 检测网关中的internalServer是否启动起来
数据库中拿取MAC
query:
SELECT eui
FROM lora_gw_eui_store
ORDER BY eui
LIMIT 1;

获取4G测试中的信噪比snr
func:
const snr = msg.payload.snr

msg.payload = {'text_content': ""}
msg.payload['text_content'] = `${snr}`
return msg

name: 获取LoRa测试中的信噪比snr
func:
const snr = msg.payload.snr_avg

msg.payload = {'text_content': ""}
msg.payload['text_content'] = snr
return msg
